p: Previous research proved that essential oil of Euodiae Fructus had antifungal effects against Candida albicans (MIC = 25.6 mg/mL) and essential oil of Rosa had antifungal activities against Candida albicans (MIC = 25 mg/mL) [ 22, 23]. Here, SEO had antifungal activities (MIC = 3.2 mg/mL). The results of this experiment imply that SEO has better antifungal activities than essential oils of Euodiae Fructus and Rosa.
